entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 01:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
